attributes.action: Get child maintenance payments deducted from receiving parents benefits
attributes.additional_details: HOWEVER if the receiving parent is on benefits the amount received in maintenance should be deducted from them benefits. This will reduce the burden on tax payers. These parent whom receiving benefits and child maintenance can be on as much as £1000 a week more than a minimum wage parent and most working people
attributes.background: Paying parents are being deducted large amounts from their salaries to support their child. No problem with paying for your child’s support
